AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.D_GPIOCONFIG: Configure the GPIO pins to use for the Audiophonics card and on/off button. The Audiophonics Sabre soundcard has scripts on the chip to flash the power button while booting/shutting down (faster blinking) and it will light it up once booted. This plugin allows for easy configuration of this behavior.
AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.D_SOFTSHUTDOWN: Controls which GPIO pin is activated (HIGH) when a shutdown is initiated from software.
AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.DD_SOFTSHUTDOWN: Default = 4, set to HIGH when Volumio receives a shutdown command
AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.D_SHUTDOWNBUTTON: Controls which GPIO pin is activated (HIGH) when the hardware button is pressed.
AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.DD_SHUTDOWNBUTTON: Default = 17, set to HIGH when the power button is pressed
AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.D_BOOTOK: Controls which GPIO pin is activated (HIGH) after booting successfully.
AUDIOPHONICSONOFF.DD_BOOTOK: Default = 22, set to HIGH after boot
